event.description: Kyle Schwarber strikes out swinging.
Kris Bryant flies out to right fielder Domingo Santana.
Anthony Rizzo grounds out sharply, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Jesus Aguilar.
Ben Zobrist homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Addison Russell flies out to center fielder Hernan Perez.
Jason Heyward reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Travis Shaw.
Willson Contreras strikes out swinging.
Brett Anderson strikes out swinging.
Javier Baez called out on strikes.
Kyle Schwarber called out on strikes.
Kris Bryant hit by pitch.
With Anthony Rizzo batting, Kris Bryant steals (1) 2nd base.
Anthony Rizzo walks.
Ben Zobrist flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Addison Russell grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Jesus Aguilar.
Jason Heyward singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun, deflected by shortstop Orlando Arcia.
With Willson Contreras batting, Jason Heyward caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Manny Pina to second baseman Jonathan Villar.
Willson Contreras singles on a line drive to right fielder Domingo Santana.
Brett Anderson strikes out swinging.

Pitching Change: Jacob Barnes replaces Jimmy Nelson, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tommy La Stella replaces Justin Grimm.

Kyle Schwarber grounds into a double play, first baseman Jesus Aguilar to shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Jesus Aguilar. Tommy La Stella out at 2nd.

Pitching Change: Neftali Feliz replaces Carlos Torres, batting 9th.

Hernan Perez singles on a fly ball to right fielder Ben Zobrist. Jesus Aguilar to 3rd. Hernan Perez to 2nd on the throw.
